title: Ticket #4069: Minor EC2 bugs turned up in GCE development
description:
The work to add Google Compute Engine (GCE) support turned up some minor bugs in the EC2 code (that the GCE code was based on).

  • GAHP command names should be case-insensitive. [DONE]
  • A CURL structure can be leaked in AmazonRequest::SendRequest() on an error. [DONE]
  • In EC2Job::EC2Job(), the variable 'value' needs to be cleared between ad lookups. [DONE]
  • ec2_gahp-related parameters should be added to the param table.
check_ins: 2013-Nov-14 15:00   Check-in [38725]: Minor EC2 bug fixes turned up by GCE development. #4069 * GAHP command names should be case-insensitive. * A CURL structure can be leaked in AmazonRequest::SendRequest() on an error. * In EC2Job::EC2Job(), the variable 'value' needs to be cleared between ad lookups. (By Jaime Frey )
